long_description: With a formfitting skully fit and reversible design, the Billboard Beanie gives you two choices for a Burton shout-out-large alpha lettering on one side and an eye-catching logo on the other. Soft acrylic knit offers excellent warmth; it also breathes well when you're active and dries quickly when damp.
short_description: With a formfitting skully fit and reversible design, the Billboard Beanie gives you two choices for a Burton shout-out-large alpha lettering on one side and an eye-catching logo on the other.
